Params: {3: "After digging underground for a while, the two of you discover an unyielding subterranean bunker. But nothing is more unyielding than Nanami's blade."}
{3: 'After entering the bunker and walking for some time, you emerge into a vast open space.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'The Heteromer Forest has already spread over Kowloong...', 4: '1'}
{3: "Nanami's voice echoes through the desolate underground structure. The silence that follows speaks for itself."}
{2: 'If left unchecked, is the Heteromer Forest going to spread across the entire Earth?', 3: '13'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nothing can stop their advance. The Red Tide will become their nourishment, and they will plunder all "information" from Earth.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Looks like the Heteromer Forest has taken over this place, too...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Plant tendrils hang from the top of the mega-structure as they feed voraciously on the nutrients of civilization.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "...We can't stay here any longer, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'The monsters bred in this world are a real pain to deal with. Nanami wants nothing to do with them.', 4: '1'}
